channel.title: [PI] Donor rank/Veteran
channel.description: Okay my server has a donor rank, but for it to show the Symbol or have any donor rights they need to have a PlayerRight of 4. But in the Character file there is a Donor = 0-3. Place. How would I make it where to be a donor you need 1 donor rank, super donor = 2 donor rank, extreme donor = 3. Also, I would like to add a Veteran rank completely. How would I go about this? I search google for guides but they are all Delta guides. If someone could help or point me out to a proper helpful easy to use guide i'd greatly appreciate it. :D Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Donor rank/Veteran
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

Okay my server has a donor rank, but for it to show the Symbol or have any donor rights they need to have a PlayerRight of 4.
But in the Character file there is a Donor = 0-3. Place.
How would I make it where to be a donor you need 1 donor rank, super donor = 2 donor rank, extreme donor = 3.
Also, I would like to add a Veteran rank completely. How would I go about this? I search google for guides but they are all Delta guides.
If someone could help or point me out to a proper helpful easy to use guide iâ€™d greatly appreciate it. Thanks.
